attributes.action: make a statement in parliament requiring Robert John Taylor to apologise for his comments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Taylor recently made many horrible comments concerning people's weight, and we believe the time has come for an apology.  The chances are he will only grant it if a request comes from someone of importance, and this may be a way for it to happen.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
